SSB would be nice :)


  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Frank Sumpti=
on 
  To: Group 
  Sent: Wednesday, December 05, 2007 7:40 AM
  Subject: [E=
VP-ITC] Never was going to quit.


   I did not intend to quit the group, I=
 just needed to stop the e-mail, that was too much. I was staying up past m=
idnight trying to read and respond. I probably stayed up too many nights in=
 a rwo workng on that board, till 2am Saturday morning, the 3 am Sunday, an=
d the till about 1a on Monday  night, then stayed up til midnight Monday on=
 e-mail, then I couldn't sleep. i need this board done post hast, so I can =
do another over the Holidays, want to see how difficult it is to add shortw=
ave, just one more coil, and switching--I think. 
   
   
   
   Frank-S 

=
